prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with blue fur and large tusks that lives in icy waters.
I want to design a Pokemon resembling a walrus with a playful personality and a love for the sea.
Generate a large, aquatic creature with a round body, whiskers, and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that can slide over ice with ease and has a thick layer of blubber.
Show me a Pokemon with a blue color scheme and a frosty appearance, perfect for cold climates.
Make a creature that thrives in the tundra, has distinctive tusks, and enjoys swimming in the ocean.
Give me a Pokemon that is both adorable and powerful, with a strong affinity for water battles.
